title: The Architect’s Guide to Open Table Formats and Object Storage
author: Brenna Buuck
description: Compare Apache Iceberg, Delta Lake and Apache Hudi and learn how to choose the right open table format for your data lakehouse.
cntitle: 架构师指南：开放式表格格式和对象存储
cndescription: 比较 Apache Iceberg、Delta Lake 和 Apache Hudi，学习如何为您的数据湖仓选择合适的开放表格式。
